column5: Just wanted to pass this site... Amazing Prices and fairly quick shipping... The shipping is dirt cheap too! 2-5 dollars. There was no problems with customs etc when we ordered some Stradic FI's @ 129.00!!!!    Anyways just thought I would pass this along to all you bargain hunters!  http://www.all-americanoutdoors.com/   Gerritt.
Gerritt, where were you 2 weeks ago before I purchased 2 reels hahaha
lol same here... I bought a Stradic FI @ BPS for 189.00!!!!!! kicking myself now.. as I picked more up for 129.00 from the company above.... I couldnt believe it!  G
How much did it cost after shipping, duty and gst?  I checked the site and it stated for reels its around $14-$24.
I ordered a Stradic FI and shipping to hamilton via USPS was 5.00  I paid no duty. Infact when I talked to them they say they almost never have a problem with customs.  G
They most likely ship USPS Expedited..  I never get dinged for brokerage (Except for the $5 CanadaPost fee) if it's shipped Expedited..
Sweet, thx.  They have a sale on a spinning reel I've been looking at too, from $150 now $111.
